name: ​ReadBy​Capability

fields.name: isReadByMe
fields.description: Specifies whether the feed element has been read (true) or not (false) by the context user.

fields.name: lastReadDateByMe
fields.description: Last date when the feed element was marked read for the context

fields.name: page
fields.description: First page of information about who read the feed element and

description: If a feed element has this capability, the context user can mark it as read.
